name: Vacant Planet
description:
Vacant Planet is a story driven game . You are a male protagonist and your mission is to survive the desolated world and find out what happened here. You will face the different waves of deadly zombies in desolated towns, villages and jungle etc with short resources which makes the playing experience more adventurous.

Player has to explore different areas and find different clues to make the antidote for vanishing the impact of the virus that has destroyed the world.

1.Graphics



Vacant Planet has a gorgeous graphics containing different landscape environment .. Player will explore different areas including jungle, villages and town. There's cool atmosphere as well as horror night.

2.Five Story Chapters


The story includes five short story base interesting chapters. Each chapter is well designed according to the story and theme of the game.

3.Awesome Weapons


Player will get different weapons in different chapters . The weapons have beautiful realistic animations and effects. Proceed with cautions, make sure to use your gears carefully.

4.Horror Combat


A strategy is necessary to survive in that horror world. No one is coming to save you so use your resources carefully. Maintain the bullets and don't waste ammo. You can also find resources by exploring the world.

5.Survival


What's going on? You don't know how much enemies you are gonna face so be careful because you'll never know what to expect.
